name: Scoff Group
slogan: Next generation recipe platform to solve your food shop
description: Scoff Club is currently an MVP IOS app helping a host of happy customers save time and money on their weekly shop. Our active customer feedback loop has given us lots of fantastic changes to implement, but we need your help!

jobs.title: CTO
jobs.description:
I'm looking for a passionate co-founder to help Scoff Club progress beyond our MVP and  transform all of our great user feedback into new features. 

I'm looking for someone who has a passion for food tech and helping real people save time, money and food waste!
jobs.descriptionHtml:
I'm looking for a passionate co-founder to help Scoff Club progress beyond our MVP and transform all of our great user feedback into new features.

I'm looking for someone who has a passion for food tech and helping real people save time, money and food waste!
